description.translate: Never fails those who handle it boldly.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Hache vaillante\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Ne fait jamais défaut à ceux qui\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la manient avec ardeur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Never fails those who\"}","{\"text\":\"§7handle it boldly.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7STR§c-1\"}"]}}
